column4: is it at all possible to migrate my old windows thunderbird mail into linux?
more specific: HOW can i migrate my old windows thunderbird mail into linux?
you might be able to copy your whole profile directory
i can't seem to find where thunderbird is saving my mail (in ubuntu)
you may need to show hidden files.... it is either in ~/.thunderbird or ~/.mozilla/thunderbird (sorry, i am using evolution)
alright thanks, i'll give it a shot
